title: Mailvox: Idiocy
author: VD
content_html:
JF finds someone to type for him:

I have two words as to your continuing absurdity that
Hitler was a lefty: Pat Buchanan. And BTW: if you are Pro – Pat Buchanan, you are Pro – Hitler. Period.

That’s ridiculous. Go read the Munich Manifesto, which Hitler co-wrote, then tell me if that sounds more like a liberal Democrat or a conservative Republican. Hitler had more in common with Howard Dean than Pat Buchanan.

If you think any modern American commentator has anything to do with Hitler, pro or con, you shouldn’t be allowed out of the house without diapers. Try reading a book for once.
content_text:
JF finds someone to type for him:
I have two words as to your continuing absurdity that
Hitler was a lefty: Pat Buchanan.  And BTW: if you are Pro – Pat Buchanan, you are Pro – Hitler. Period.
That’s ridiculous.  Go read the Munich Manifesto, which Hitler co-wrote, then tell me if that sounds more like a liberal Democrat or a conservative Republican.  Hitler had more in common with Howard Dean than Pat Buchanan.
If you think any modern American commentator has anything to do with Hitler, pro or con, you shouldn’t be allowed out of the house without diapers.  Try reading a book for once.
